code: import React from"react";import'./UserList.css';import md5 from'blueimp-md5';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const UserList=_ref=>{let{users,selectedUser,onlineUsers,onSelectUser}=_ref;return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"user-list",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{children:"Contacts"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"users",children:users.map(user=>{const hash=md5(user.email);const avatarUrl="https://www.gravatar.com/avatar/".concat(hash,"?d=identicon");return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"user-item ".concat((selectedUser===null||selectedUser===void 0?void 0:selectedUser._id)===user._id?'active':''),onClick:()=>onSelectUser(user),children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"user-info",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:avatarUrl,alt:user.username,className:"avatar"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"username",children:user.username}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"status ".concat(onlineUsers.includes(user._id)?'online':'offline'),children:onlineUsers.includes(user._id)?'● Online':'○ Offline'})]})},user._id);})})]});};export default UserList;
